message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value that represents the amount of profit the entity retains after all expenses have been deducted from total revenue.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see that "Net Profit" is the line item that represents this value. This appears in the "Cash Flow From Operating Activities" section and represents the profit after all expenses, including operating costs, interest, tax, depreciation, and amortization have been deducted.

In the given problem, the Net Profit is listed as 3,744,117.89 on 2024-02-05.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '3744117.89'}}
```
